record.id: field.name="date.order" and file.name="tzfile" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: date.order
record.file.name: tzfile

brief.brief: Only enter a format if you want to override the format set in the System Wide Company Record.

detail.detail: mm/dd/yy: Standard US date format - mm/dd/yy equals month, day, and year.
dd/mm/yy- European date format - dd/mm/yy equals day, month, and year.
yy/mm/dd: Optional date format - yy/mm/dd equals year, month, and day.
mm/dd/yyyy: Optional date format - mm/dd/yyyy equals month, day, and year.
dd/mm/yyyy: Optional date format - dd/mm/yyyy equals day, month, and year.
yyyy/mm/dd: Optional date format - yyyy/mm/dd equals year, month, and day.
